history.proof: intros x y. destruct x as [x Hx], y as [y Hy]. apply Zp_inj. sauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 x : nat Hx : x < p y : nat Hy : y < p n : nat H : nat -> proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy) = proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx) -> proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy) = proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx) n0 : nat H0 : proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy) = proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx) Unable to unify "proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx)" with "proj1_sig (exist (fun x : nat => x < p) x Hx ⊕ exist (fun x : nat => x < p) y Hy)".

original: intros x y. unfold Zp in *. destruct x as [x Hx], y as [y Hy]. apply Zp_inj. unfold Zp_op. repeat rewrite Nat.add_comm. elim (Nat.modulo x p); elim (Nat.modulo y p); intros. - rewrite rem_diag; auto. - rewrite rem_diag; auto. - apply rem_rem_diag; auto. - reflexivity.
